title: Pre Roll Ad Playback (Free User) - With Ad Blocker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the user has their Ad Blocker turned on
custom_steps: WHEN the user starts the MLB.tv Free Game of the Day Stream
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the preroll ad start playback

title: Pre Roll Ad Playback (Free User) - Without Ad Blocker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the user has their Ad Blocker turned off
custom_steps: WHEN the user starts the MLB.tv Free Game of the Day Stream
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the preroll ad start playback

title: Pre Roll Ad Playback (Free User) - With Ad Blocker (Clickable)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the user has their Ad Blocker turned on
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts the MLB.tv Free Game of the Day Stream
AND the user clicks on the preroll ad
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the preroll ad start playback
AND the user will be redirected to the advertiser's site.

title: Pre Roll Ad Playback (Free User) - Without Ad Blocker (Clickable)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the user has their Ad Blocker turned off
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts the MLB.tv Free Game of the Day Stream
AND the user clicks on the preroll ad
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the preroll ad start playback
AND the user will be redirected to the advertiser's site.

title: Pre Roll Ad Playback (Free User) - With Ad Blocker (Mute/Unmute)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the user has their Ad Blocker turned on
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts the MLB.tv Free Game of the Day Stream
AND the user clicks on the unmute button
AND the user clicks on the mute button
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the preroll ad start playback
AND the user will hear the ad start playing with sound
AND the user will hear the ad muted

title: Pre Roll Ad Playback (Free User) - Without Ad Blocker (Mute/Unmute)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the user has their Ad Blocker turned off
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts the MLB.tv Free Game of the Day Stream
AND the user clicks on the unmute button
AND the user clicks on the mute button
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the preroll ad start playback
AND the user will hear the ad start playing with sound
AND the user will hear the ad muted

title: Mid Roll Ad Playback - With Ad Blocker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the user's account is entitled
AND the user has Ad Blocker turned on
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts a MLB.tv stream
AND the user has encountered a mid-roll advertisement
custom_expected: THEN the user should see the advertisement play

custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the user's account is entitled
AND the user has Ad Blocker turned off
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts a MLB.tv stream
AND the user has encountered a mid-roll advertisement
custom_expected: THEN the user should see the advertisement play

custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the user's account is entitled
AND the user has Ad Blocker turned on
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts a MLB.tv stream

AND the user clicks on the advertisement
custom_expected:

title: Mid Roll Ad Playback - With Ad Blocker (Mute/Unmute)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the user's account is entitled
AND the user has Ad Blocker turned on
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts a MLB.tv stream
AND the user has encountered a mid-roll advertisement
AND the user clicks the unmute button
AND the user clicks the mute button
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the advertisement play
AND the user will hear the advertisement play with sound
AND the user will hear the advertisement play without sound.

title: Mid Roll Ad Playback - Without Ad Blocker (Mute/Unmute)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the user's account is entitled
AND the user has Ad Blocker turned off
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts a MLB.tv stream
AND the user has encountered a mid-roll advertisement
AND the user clicks the unmute button
AND the user clicks the mute button
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the advertisement play
AND the user will hear the advertisement play with sound
AND the user will hear the advertisement play without sound.

title: DFP Ad Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the user has a MLB.tv entitlement
AND the user has ad blocker turned off
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts a stream
AND the user has seen an advertisement
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the following request URL: 
`https://pubads.g.doubleclick.net/gampad/live/ads?*`

AND the user should see the following param in the response:
>   <AdSystem>GDFP</AdSystem>

title: GDAI Ad Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com account
AND the account is entitled with MLB.tv
AND the user has ad blocker turned on
custom_steps:
WHEN the user access' a MLB.tv stream
AND the user sees an advertisement
custom_expected: THEN the user should see the following URL appear: https://dai.google.com/pods/api/v1/

title: Ad Playback - Large Seek Live Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a MLB.com Account
AND the account has been entitled with MLB.tv
custom_steps:
WHEN the user access' a MLB.tv Stream
AND the user has started the stream from the beginning
AND the user seeks to a point in the stream
custom_expected: THEN the user should still see ads for those breaks appear.

title: Regular Season - Account already linked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com account
AND the account has been linked to an Extra Innings Account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks on a Live OR an archived stream
AND the user log's in with the account
AND the user has respected the blackout rules, the concurrency cap, and the archived stream rules
AND the user clicks play
custom_expected: THEN the user should see video playback

title: Regular Season - Account Unlinked/Expired
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com account
AND the account has been linked to an Extra Innings Account that is either unlinked OR expired
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks on a Live OR an archived stream
AND the user log's in with the account
AND the user has respected the blackout rules, the concurrency cap, and the archived stream rules
AND the user clicks play
custom_expected: THEN the user should be blocked from playback.

title: Regular Season - Valid Cable Provider (Existing MLB Account)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users have an MLB Account
AND the user has selected an Live streamed game (that isn't blacked out to their location) OR an archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks on the Activate button
AND the user selects Get Started under MLB.TV with Extra Innings 
AND the user logs in with a valid MLB account
AND the user authenticates with a valid cable provider with Extra Innings
custom_expected: THEN the user should be redirected to the live OR archived video with successful playback.

title: Regular Season - Valid Cable Provider (New MLB Account)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users do not have an MLB Account
AND the user has selected an Live streamed game (that isn't blacked out to their location) OR an archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks on the Activate button
AND the user selects Get Started under MLB.TV with Extra Innings 
AND the user clicks on Sign Up
AND the user registers an account
AND the user authenticates with a valid cable provider with Extra Innings
custom_expected: THEN the user should be redirected to the live OR archived video with successful playback.

title: Regular Season - Invalid Cable Provider
Post Season - Valid Cable Provider
Post Season - Invalid Cable Provider
Playback - Authenticated User (Registered)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.tv account
AND the user is located within one of the ROOT sports locations (Astros, Mariners, Pirates, Rockies)
AND the user has authenticated with the correct account: https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games/help-center/in-market-root-att-faq
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the respective game (Astros, Mariners, Pirates, Rockies)
AND the user clicks play
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see playback
AND the user should see the ROOT Sports branding.

title: MLBALL - Live Stream Positive Path
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the account has an MLBALL entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to a mlb.tv live stream
AND the user is respecting the blackout restrictions
AND the user is respecting the concurrency cap
AND the user clicks play
custom_expected: THEN the user should be able view the live stream

title: MLBALL - Archived Stream Positive Path
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the account has an MLBALL entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to a mlb.tv archive stream
AND the user is respecting the archive stream rules
AND the user is respecting the blackout restrictions
AND the user is respecting the concurrency cap
AND the user clicks play
custom_expected: THEN the user should be able view the live stream

title: MLBALL - Live Stream Negative Path
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com account
AND the account has an MLBALL entitlement that is expired OR invalid
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to a live stream game
AND the user respects the blackout rules
AND the user respects the concurrency rules
AND the user clicks Play
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be unable to play the live stream
AND the user should see "Unable to verify access. Please log out and try to log in again. Please click "Learn More" if you require assistance."
AND there should be a clickable button that sends users to https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games/help-center/accounts.

title: MLBALL - Archived Stream Negative Path
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MLB.com account
AND the account has an MLBALL entitlement that is expired OR invalid
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to an archived stream
AND the user respects the archived stream rules
AND the user respects the blackout rules
AND the user respects the concurrency rules
AND the user clicks Play
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be unable to play the live stream
AND the user should see "Unable to verify access. Please log out and try to log in again. Please click "Learn More" if you require assistance."
AND there should be a clickable button that sends users to https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games/help-center/accounts.
